AggOO::GradientNullAdapter

AggOO::GradientNullAdapter Class Reference

#include <AggOOStyleHandlerGradient.h>

Inheritance diagram for AggOO::GradientNullAdapter:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Sometimes, there is no adapter applied to the gradient function (i.e. the clamp method.) This allows passing the gradient function on to the span_generator by just applying an empty GradientAdapter class to the function.
